body: You can add to registers other than AX, I think you're misreading that manual (it is just that the add to AX and the add to other registers is encoded differently).  The problem is that you can't add a 64-bit immediate.  Immediates are required to fit in sign-extended 32 bits.  We need to fix this generally in our OP -> OPconst rewrite rules.  I'll hack up a fix.
